attributes.action: Allow separate vaccinations for school-leavers under the NHS at the doctors surgery, for MMR, Polio, Diphtheria and Tetanus,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Children of age 16 "School-leavers" are encouraged to have an injection at school that contains MMR, Diphtheria, Polio, and Tetanus.  While this single "all-in-one" should be an option, we believe that parents should also have the choice of individual vaccinations under the NHS.  Currently this is not an option; parents have to pay £100 upwards to have separate injections. If they cannot afford this, they may simply opt-out of all vaccine boosters.
We therefore petition that the choice of separate, or other combinations of, vaccines is made available under the NHS to parents of school-leavers.
